title: Challenge Valuation
content:
Last week I gave my paper for challenge valuation, and since then there has been no update about it, I even submitted the physical copy of the form in CoE office.
How will I get any update regarding it ? Like I have never given for challenge valuation.

comments.body: wait it out- it will update on pesuacademy once they recheck

It'll take 2 weeks generally for re-eval results to come out

You can see the results under the ESA results tab itself
"Write an mail to the relevant offices; they may respond to ur prob if u r in a hurry."
